DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (i) UNN and IBADAN - requirements as in Agricultural 
Economics and Agriculture respectively.  
(ii) FUTO and BENIN - Same as in Agricultural 
Economics.  
(iii) UNIOSUN same as in Fisheries.  
(iv) CALABAR requires Mathematics or Physics.  
(v) RSUST requires Agricultural Science or Biology.

DIRECT ENTRY  
MINNA does not accept Social Science subjects.  
Other requirements are as in Agriculture.   
NDU - No direct entry admission.  
 OOU requires ‘A’ level passes in both Chemistry and 
Biology. It also accepts ND credit in Agriculture to 
100 level programme.  ND  distinction HND credit 
NCE Double major at credit level in Agriculture.  
RSUST and FUTO - Same as in Animal Science.  
MINNA accepts NCE/ND/HND with a minimum of 
lower credit level in addition to the UTME 
requirements.  
ADSU - as in Animal Production & Fisheries  
EKSU and FUTA - as in Agricultural Economics and 
Extension.  
BAUCHI accepts NCE, ND program in addition to the 
UTME requirements.  
IMSU accepts ND or NCE Double Major and HND in 
Agriculture with at least a credit pass.  
FUTO and BENIN – Same as in Agricultural 
Economics.  
UNN same as in Agricultural Economics and  
Extension  
MAUTY accepts  
ND/NCE with a minimum of merit grade in  
Agriculture.  
IJMB with at least seven (7) cumulative points in  
Chemistry, Biology/ Agricult ural and Physics/  
Mathematics.
